title: Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Cabriole Legs and Ball and Claw Feet, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Sideboard with Cabriole Legs and Ball and Claw Feet
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, bottom right: SIDEBOARD 7' 0"-long; inside image left and far right, illegible inscriptions, probably indicating fininshes
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Large oblong sideboard with four scrolled legs with ball and claw feet carved with acanthus decoration; serpentine tri-partite front with four conforming drawers above recessed central section which has two more drawers with small door either side; central section flanked by two large doors; low backsplash with paterna medallion decoration center.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Sideboard with Cabriole Legs and Ball and Claw Feet, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-36
